name: plaintiveness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of sounding slightly sad: There is a quality of plaintiveness in her singing. Much of the film is mesmerizing: some of its plaintiveness could make you weep. See
plaintive
More examplesFewer examplesThe writing is sometimes exquisite in its plaintiveness.The song deepens from plaintiveness to irrevocable sorrow.Her performance is wonderfully sympathetic, without any recourse to plaintiveness or souped-up emotion.
